channel.title: Server lag, Server or VPS?
channel.description:
Ok, so it was all running fine with like 3 players online.. now I have 6, and the server is lagging very badly.. Is it the server or the vps? The vps im using has 1gb of dedicated ram, is that not enough for a 718 server?
If not, how much do you recommend for like 20 ish players online.

item.title: Server lag, Server or VPS?
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

i would say 4gb if u expect 20 players online

Read full topic

item.title: Server lag, Server or VPS?
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

HcoJustin:

Considering the OS is using a good portion of that 1gb ram, you don’t have enough. I’m pretty sure the server alone could use 1gb with no players on.

would 2gb be enough? or should i go for that 4gb

Read full topic

item.description:
